divs: Sighting DetailsSecond time we have seen this phenomenon in the past 12 months. We sit out back at night. From the NW we saw app. 4 bright orange glowing spheres rising. They were traveling at great spped up into the atmosphere. Over the course of about 2 hours they continued to rise in great numbers. Some took formations and some did not. We noticed the same things reported all over the country over the past few days.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Cooper City
There were no other sightings in Cooper City on or around July 3rd 2011
